name: Ancient Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon
text: Ancient Dark Magician + Ancient Red-Eyes B. Dragon This cards summoning can not be negated. you can also Special Summon this card from your extra deck or GY by tributing 1 Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon you control if this card is special summoned once per turn (quick effect): you can discard 1 Anciant Inferno Fire Blast from your hand if you do inflict damage to your opponant equal to this cards current ATK. This card is unaffected by card effects. Twice per turn, you can target 1 card your opponent controls and destroy it and if you do your opponent takes damage equal to that monsters ATK. Once per Turn, (Quick Effect) If your opponant activates a card or effect you can discard a card from your hand then if you do negate the activation and distroy that card and if you do that this card gains 1000 ATK and DEF. This card cannot be attacked by Wyrms, Dragons or Spellcaster Type Monsters. Once Per Turn (Quick Effect) you can target 1 Wyrm, Dragon or Spellcaster Monster your Opponent controls and if you do take control of it until the end of your opponents next Turn. If this card in its owners control leaves the field at the End Phase you can banish all cards Your Opponent controls and if you do Special Sommon this card from your GY in ATK. Your opponent can not activate cards or effects in response to any of this cards effects. You can use all effects of "Ancient Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon" on Either Players turn.
